abstract: Paris court convicts German doctor Dieter Krombach in the 1982 death of his stepdaughter Kalinka Bamberski, bringing to a tentative close a 29-year crusade by the girl's father Andre Bamberski to see Krombach brought to justice.
snippet: A Paris court convicted a German doctor of manslaughter in the 1982 death of his stepdaughter.
lead_paragraph: A Paris court convicted a German doctor of manslaughter in the 1982 death of his stepdaughter.

headline.main: Father’s Quest for Justice Ends in Paris Guilty Verdict
headline.print_headline: Father’s Quest for Justice Ends in Paris Guilty Verdict
headline.seo: Father’s Drive for Justice Ends in Guilty Verdict in France
